definition: The study and practice of designing and constructing buildings, structures, and spaces, encompassing the aesthetic, functional, and technical aspects. It involves the planning, creation, and organization of architectural elements to create habitable and visually appealing environments. This term is commonly used to refer to the discipline, profession, and field of architecture.

examples.german: Die Architektur des Gebäudes ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The architecture of the building is impressive.

examples.german: Die Architektur der Stadt ist einzigartig.
examples.english: The architecture of the city is unique.

examples.german: Die Architektur des Museums ist sehr ansprechend.
examples.english: The architecture of the museum is very appealing.

examples.german: Die Architektur hat einen großen Einfluss auf das Stadtbild.
examples.english: Architecture has a significant impact on the cityscape.
